name: Extra Mesmerist Tricks
text: You can use your mesmerist tricks more often.
benefit: You can implant two additional mesmerist tricks per day.
special: You can gain Extra Mesmerist Tricks multiple times. Its effects stack.
text_zh: 你可以比以往使用更多次的催眠师诡计。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 你每日可以额外植入2次催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取该专长，其效果会叠加。
